review: I was really hope for more shows and content as part of the PRIME membership. There are a lot of choices that are easy to search, but most have an added cost. The voice feature works great and that's the best way to search, using the arrow keys works but is slow to scroll through selections. On a PC there are more categories to help with the search. It was quick and easy to set up and use with HDMI TV. Worth the price ($75 at BestBuy).

review: This is Great! I've had Amazon Prime for a couple of years and never thought about the videos. I got this as a present from my son. We hooked it up in minutes and started watching shows quickly. I know I've got a slow internet connection, but this thing works great! We cancelled all our movie channels on Dish. There is so much to watch and it's so easy!!! Even my wife enjoys all the new stuff we can watch. This thing is probably saving us $30-$40 per month!!!
